resources.string: The application cannot access the EthernetManager hidden class. This may be caused by restrictions in accessing non-SDK interfaces. Please verify if the application is signed with the platform key or run this command to allow hidden API access from adb: \n $ adb shell settings put global hidden_api_policy 1

Ethernet Handler Android SDK extension example application 

 This application serves as a reference implementation of Kynetics' Ethernet Adapter Android SDK Extension library. 


To learn more about SDK Extension licensing please visit:
 https://www.kynetics.com/android-sdk-extensions


Application source code is available under Apache v2.0 licence at:
 https://github.com/Kynetics/android-ethernet-manager-example-app
